content: super simple sock pattern pattern by allison sarnoff for dye-namics yarn this is as basic as sock patterns get it will fit a women s medium foot and looks fabulous with any kind of yarn here s what you need yarn one skein of dye-namics yarn fingering 100% superwash merino or 400 yards in the fingering weight yarn of your choice shown in eastern stripe colorway needles size 2 2 75mm double pointed needles or size needed to achieve gauge notions tapestry needles gauge 8 stitches/inch in stockinette stitch co = cast on k1 = knit one p1= purl one k2tog = knit two stitches together ssk = slip slip knit pattern using the long tail cast on method co 64 stitches and distribute as evenly as possible on three double pointed needles 20 24 20 cuff join into a circle being careful not to twist k2 p2 around until your piece measures 2 from cast on edge leg knit in stockinette until your piece measures 7 from cast on edge heel flap knit 16 stitches transfer remaining stitches from needle one onto needle 2 instep needle turn work and purl back the 16 stitches then purl 16 more stitches from needle 3 transfer remaining stitches from needle 3 to needle 2 you should have 32 stitches on each of your two remaining needles row 1 right side *slip one stitch purlwise k1* repeat from * to * across the heel flap row 2 wrong side slip the first stitch purlwise with the yarn in front purl the remaining stitches repeat row 1 and 2 fifteen more times for a total of 32 row ending with a wrong side row you should have 16 chain stitches along each side of the heel flap turn heel knit 18 ssk k1 turn work slip 1 purlwise purl 5 p2tog p1 turn work row 1 slip 1 purlwise knit until 1 stitch before the gap ssk k1 turn work row 2 slip 1 purlwise purl until 1 stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn work continue until all stitches have been worked 18 stitches remain heel gusset knit across the remaining 18 stitches of the heel flap using the same needle pick up and knit 16 stitches along the heel flap pick up an extra stitch in the corner to avoid a hole this will be needle one with a new needle knit across the 32 instep stitches this will be needle two with a new needle pick up and knit a stitch in the corner of the heel flap then pick up and knit another 16 stitches along the edge of the heel flap then using the same needle knit across 9 stitches from needle 1 this will be needle three you should now have 26 stitches each on needle 1 and needle 3 and 32 stitches on needle 2 knit one round in stockinette reduction round knit to the last three stitches on needle 1 k2tog k1 knit across needle 2
